name: Vicki Cospar
review: The puppy pads work great. I use them in our whelping box and they clean up quickly. No leaks, no lingering smell, and they hold up after multiple washes.

name: Maria Fig
review: These pads are a lifesaver for nighttime accidents. They absorb fast and keep the floor clean. I ordered a second set so I always have a fresh one ready.
